verses.verse: Yet now hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, whom I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> that made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, and formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee from the womb <S%H990><s%>, which will help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee; Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, O Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and thou, Jesurun <S%H3484><s%>, whom I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

For I will pour <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> upon him that is thirsty <S%H6771><s%>, and floods <S%H5140><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the dry ground <S%H3004><s%>: I will pour <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, and my b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> upon thine offspring <S%H6631><s%>:
And they shall spring up <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as among <S%H996><s%> the grass <S%H2682><s%>, as willows <S%H6155><s%> by the water <S%H4325><s%> courses <S%H2988><s%>.

One shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am the YY'S <S%H3068><s%>; and another shall call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; and another shall subscribe <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his hand <S%H3027><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and surname <S%H3655><s%> <S%H8762><s%> himself by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and his redeemer <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; I am the first <S%H7223><s%>, and I am the last <S%H314><s%>; and beside <S%H1107><s%> me there is no 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And who, as I, shall call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it, and set it in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for me, since I appointed <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ancient <S%H5769><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>? and the things that are coming <S%H857><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, let them shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto them.

Fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye not, neither be afraid <S%H7297><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H7297><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: have not I told <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee from that time <S%H227><s%>, and have declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it? ye are even my witnesses <S%H5707><s%>. Is there <S%H3426><s%> a 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> me? yea, there is no 'Elohim <S%H6697><s%>; I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not any.

They that make <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%> are all of them vanity <S%H8414><s%>; and their delectable things <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8803><s%> shall not profit <S%H3276><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; and they are their own witnesses <S%H5707><s%>; they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, nor know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; that they may be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Who hath formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a god <S%H410><s%>, or molten <S%H5258><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%> that is profitable <S%H3276><s%> <S%H8687><s%> for nothing <S%H1115><s%> ?

Behold, all his fellows <S%H2270><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and the workmen <S%H2796><s%>, they are of men <S%H120><s%>: let them all be gathered together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, let them stand up <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; yet they shall fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and they shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

The smith <S%H1270><s%> <S%H2796><s%> with the tongs <S%H4621><s%> both worketh <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the coals <S%H6352><s%>, and fashioneth <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with hammers <S%H4717><s%>, and worketh <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with the strength <S%H3581><s%> of his arms <S%H2220><s%>: yea, he is hungry <S%H7457><s%>, and his strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H369><s%>: he drinketh <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>, and is faint <S%H3286><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

The carpenter <S%H2796><s%> <S%H6086><s%> stretcheth out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his rule <S%H6957><s%>; he marketh it out <S%H8388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with a line <S%H8279><s%>; he fitteth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with planes <S%H4741><s%>, and he marketh it out <S%H8388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with the compass <S%H4230><s%>, and maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it after the figure <S%H8403><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>, according to the beauty <S%H8597><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>; that it may remain <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>.

He heweth him down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8800><s%> cedars <S%H730><s%>, and taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the cypress <S%H8645><s%> and the oak <S%H437><s%>, which he strengtheneth <S%H553><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for himself among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>: he planteth <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an ash <S%H766><s%>, and the rain <S%H1653><s%> doth nourish <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it.

Then shall it be for a man <S%H120><s%> to burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8763><s%>: for he will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof, and warm <S%H2552><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself; yea, he kindleth <S%H5400><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it, and baketh <S%H644><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>; yea, he maketh <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a god <S%H410><s%>, and worshippeth <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> it; he maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, and falleth down <S%H5456><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereto.

He burneth <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> part <S%H2677><s%> thereof in <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>; with part <S%H2677><s%> thereof he eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; he roasteth <S%H6740><s%> <S%H8799><s%> roast <S%H6748><s%>, and is satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: yea, he warmeth <S%H2552><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself, and saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, I am warm <S%H2552><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the fire <S%H217><s%>:

And the residue <S%H7611><s%> thereof he maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a god <S%H410><s%>, even his graven image <S%H6459><s%>: he falleth down <S%H5456><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto it, and worshippeth <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> it, and prayeth <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto it, and saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me; for thou art my god <S%H410><s%>.

They have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> nor understood <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for he hath shut <S%H2902><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that they cannot see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and their hearts <S%H3826><s%>, that they cannot understand <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

And none considereth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, neither is there knowledge <S%H1847><s%> nor understanding <S%H8394><s%> to say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I have burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> part <S%H2677><s%> of it in <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>; yea, also I have baked <S%H644><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> upon the coals <S%H1513><s%> thereof; I have roasted <S%H6740><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: and shall I make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> thereof an abomination <S%H8441><s%>? shall I fall down <S%H5456><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the stock <S%H944><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> ?

He feedeth <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on ashes <S%H665><s%>: a deceived <S%H2048><s%> <S%H8795><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> hath turned him aside <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, that he cannot deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>, nor say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is there not a lie <S%H8267><s%> in my right hand <S%H3225><s%> ?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> these, O Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; for thou art my servant <S%H5650><s%>: I have formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee; thou art my servant <S%H5650><s%>: O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, thou shalt not be forgotten <S%H5382><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of me.

I have blotted out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, as a thick cloud <S%H5645><s%>, thy transgressions <S%H6588><s%>, and, as a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, thy sins <S%H2403><s%>: return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me; for I have redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O ye heavens <S%H8064><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it: shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, ye lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: break forth <S%H6476><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into singing <S%H7440><s%>, ye mountains <S%H2022><s%>, O forest <S%H3293><s%>, and every tree <S%H6086><s%> therein: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and glorified <S%H6286><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, thy redeemer <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and he that formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee from the womb <S%H990><s%>, I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> that maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all things; that stretcheth forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> alone; that spreadeth abroad <S%H7554><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by myself;

That frustrateth <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the tokens <S%H226><s%> of the liars <S%H907><s%>, and maketh diviners <S%H7080><s%> <S%H8802><s%> mad <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8779><s%>; that turneth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8688><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men backward <S%H268><s%>, and maketh their knowledge <S%H1847><s%> foolish <S%H5528><s%> <S%H8762><s%>;

That confirmeth <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of his servant <S%H5650><s%>, and performeth <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of his messengers <S%H4397><s%>; that saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, Thou shalt be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8714><s%>; and to the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, Ye shall be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8787><s%> the decayed places <S%H2723><s%> thereof:
That saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the deep <S%H6683><s%>, Be dry <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and I will dry up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy rivers <S%H5104><s%>:

That saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%>, He is my shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and shall perform <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all my pleasure <S%H2656><s%>: even saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, Thou shalt be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and to the temple <S%H1964><s%>, Thy foundation shall be laid <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
